OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD ASSOCIATION OF SCHOOL GOVERNING BODIES (SASGB)

Desc.entry: Democratic forum for affiliated school governing bodies in Sheffield's Children and Young People's Directorate. Aims to consult on and co-ordinate policy on matters of mutual concern. Represents views to the Children and Young People's Directorate, working in partnership with all interested parties. Aims to improve communications between governing bodies themselves and the Children and Young People's Directorate.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Twice termly (Executive Committee), please contact for details
